ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | atomcvr0.z | |- .0. = ( 0. ` K ) |
| 2 |  | atomcvr0.c | |- C = ( <o ` K ) |
| 3 |  | atomcvr0.a | |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 5 | 4, 1, 2, 3 | #P_isat | |- ( K e. D -> ( P e. A <-> ( P e. ( Base ` K ) /\ .0. C P ) ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simplbda | |- ( ( K e. D /\ P e. A ) -> .0. C P ) |
